dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: You dare to enter my domain, puny human?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come in peace. I seek no quarrel with you.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peace? There is no place for peace here. Only power.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I understand. I will leave you be.
I challenge you to a fight!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Haha! You amuse me with your bravery. Prepare for battle!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I mean no harm. I'm just passing through.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Passing through? There is no 'just passing through' in these lands.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I apologize for intruding. I will leave immediately.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Apologies won't save you now. Prepare yourself!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Let's coexist peacefully. There's no need for conflict.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Weakling! Peace is for the meek. I will show you true power!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek knowledge. Can you help me understand this realm?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Knowledge? You are not worthy of the knowledge I possess.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I respect your power. I will leave you to your mysteries.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Respect is futile. Knowledge is power, and you have none.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I demand answers! Tell me or face the consequences!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Demanding answers? Bold move, but you shall face the consequences of your insolence!
